Context: File: install-dev/classes/controllerHttp.php:380 Comment: Link to localized video tutorial (if available)

trans-unit.source: Configure your database by filling out the following fields
trans-unit.target: 填写以下字段配置数据库

trans-unit.source: To use PrestaShop, you must create a database to collect all of your store's data-related activities.
trans-unit.target: 为了正确使用PrestaShop，您需要create a database收集您网店的所有项目相关数据。

trans-unit.source: The default port is 3306. To use a different port, add the port number at the end of your server's address i.e ":4242".
trans-unit.target: 默认端口为3306。如要使用不同的端口，请在服务器的地址端口末端添加“：4242”。
删除现有表格（开发模式）
现在测试你的数据库连接吧！

trans-unit.source: We are currently checking PrestaShop compatibility with your system environment
trans-unit.target: 我们正在检查您和 PrestaShop 的系统环境兼容

trans-unit.source: If you have any questions, please visit our documentation and community forum.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有任何疑问，请访问我们的文档和社区论坛。

trans-unit.source: PrestaShop compatibility with your system environment has been verified!
trans-unit.target: 您和 PrestaShop 的系统环境兼容已通过验证！

trans-unit.source: Oops! Please correct the item(s) below, and then click "Refresh information" to test the compatibility of your new system.
trans-unit.target: 糟糕！请更正下面商品，然后单击“刷新信息”，以测试新系统的兼容性。

trans-unit.source: Help us learn more about your store so we can offer you optimal guidance and the best features for your business!
trans-unit.target: 帮助我们更多地了解你的店铺，我们可以为您的企业提供最佳的指导和最合适的功能！

trans-unit.source: Demo products are a good way to learn how to use PrestaShop. You should install them if you are not familiar with it.
trans-unit.target: 演示商品是个了解如何使用 Prestashop 好方法。如果您还不熟悉如何在 PrestaShop 上开店，您应该安装它们。

trans-unit.source: Optional - You can add you logo at a later time.
trans-unit.target: 可选 - 你可迟些添加您的标志。

trans-unit.source: This email address will be your username to access your store's back office.
trans-unit.target: 这个电子邮件地址将成为您的用户名来访问您的店铺后台。

trans-unit.source: All information you give us is collected by us and is subject to data processing and statistics, it is necessary for the members of the PrestaShop company in order to respond to your requests. Your personal data may be communicated to service providers and partners as part of partner relationships. Under the current "Act on Data Processing, Data Files and Individual Liberties" you have the right to access, rectify and oppose to the processing of your personal data through this link.
trans-unit.target: 您提供给我们的所有信息由我们收集用于数据处理和统计，作为Prestashop公司的成员为了响应您的请求，这是必要的。您的个人数据可能会被传递给服务供应商和合作伙伴，作为合作伙伴关系的一部分。根据目前的“关于数据处理，数据文件和个人自由法案”您有权访问、纠正和反对对您个人数据的处理，通过该链接。

trans-unit.source: To install PrestaShop, you need to have JavaScript enabled in your browser.
trans-unit.target: 您需要在浏览器中启用 JavaScript 来安装 PrestaShop。

trans-unit.source: If you need some assistance, you can get tailored help from our support team. The official documentation is also here to guide you.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要一些帮助，您可以从我们的技术支持队伍获得个别帮助。 官方文档也可以指导你。

trans-unit.source: To enjoy the many features that are offered for free by PrestaShop, please read the license terms below. PrestaShop core is licensed under OSL 3.0, while the modules and themes are licensed under AFL 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 想要享受 PrestaShop 提供的多种免费功能，请阅读下面的许可条款。Prestashop 核心是以 OSL 3.0协议 授权，但是模块和主题授权于 AFL3.0 协议。

trans-unit.source: I agree to the above terms and conditions.
trans-unit.target: 我同意上述条款和条件。

trans-unit.source: I agree to participate in improving the solution by sending anonymous information about my configuration.
trans-unit.target: 我同意参与改善的解决方案，通过发送我的配置的匿名信息。

trans-unit.source: PrestaShop requires at least 32 MB of memory to run: please check the memory_limit directive in your php.ini file or contact your host provider about this.
trans-unit.target: Prestashop 至少需要32M的内存来运行，请检查php.ini中的memory_limit的指令或联系您的主机提供商

trans-unit.source:
Warning: You cannot use this tool to upgrade your store anymore.

You already have PrestaShop version %version% installed.

If you want to upgrade to the latest version, please read our documentation: %doc%
trans-unit.target:
警告：你无法使用此工具来升级你的店铺。

您已经安装了 PrestaShop 的 %version% s版本。

如果你想升级到最新版本，请阅读我们的文档：%doc%

trans-unit.source: Installing PrestaShop is quick and easy. In just a few moments, you will become part of a community consisting of more than 250,000 merchants. You are on the way to creating your own unique online store that you can manage easily every day.
trans-unit.target: 安装PrestaShop简单而且快速。只需一会功夫,您将成为超过250,000 成员的商人之一。你正在创建您自己的独特的在线商店，可以轻松地管理每一天。

trans-unit.source: If you need help, do not hesitate to watch this short tutorial, or check our documentation.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要帮助，不要迟疑，立刻前往请观看简易教程，或是查看我们的文档。
在安装的过程中出现了错误...

trans-unit.source: You can use the links on the left column to go back to the previous steps, or restart the installation process by clicking here.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用左侧列中的链接返回到前面的步骤，或者通过点击这里重新启动安装​​过程。

trans-unit.source: You have just finished installing your shop. Thank you for using PrestaShop!
trans-unit.target: 您已完成店铺的安装。感谢您使用 PrestaShop！

trans-unit.source: For security purposes, you must delete the "install" folder.
trans-unit.target: 为了保证安全，你必须删除文件夹 “安装” 。

trans-unit.source: Manage your store using your Back Office. Manage your orders and customers, add modules, change themes, etc.
trans-unit.target: 使用后台管理您的店铺。管理您的订单和客户，添加模块，更改主题等。

trans-unit.source: Discover your store as your future customers will see it!
trans-unit.target: 站在顾客的位置上看您的店铺！

trans-unit.source: Share your experience with your friends!
I just built an online store with PrestaShop!
trans-unit.target: 我刚刚在PrestaShop开了一家网上商店！
在这里看愉快的经验: http://vimeo.com/89298199

trans-unit.source: Check out PrestaShop Addons to add that little something extra to your store!
trans-unit.target: 检测 PrestaShop 的附加组件增强您的店铺!

trans-unit.source: PHP 5.6 or later is not enabled
trans-unit.target: PHP 5.6 或更高版本未启用

trans-unit.source: Cannot create new files and folders
trans-unit.target: 无法创建新文件和文件夹

trans-unit.source: PDO MySQL extension is not loaded
Not all files were successfully uploaded on your server
trans-unit.target: 不是全部文件上载到了您的服务器

trans-unit.source: Your lastname contains some invalid characters
trans-unit.target: 你的姓包含一些无效的字符

trans-unit.source: The password and its confirmation are different

trans-unit.target: 此电子邮件地址是无效的。
图片文件夹 %s 不可写

trans-unit.source: An error occurred during logo copy.
trans-unit.target: 在标志复制过程中发生错误。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred during logo upload.
trans-unit.target: 在标志上传过程中发生错误。

trans-unit.source: Your firstname contains some invalid characters
trans-unit.target: 你的名字包含一些无效的字符

trans-unit.source: Your database server does not support the utf-8 charset.
trans-unit.target: 您的数据库服务器不支持UTF-8字符集。

trans-unit.note: Context: File: install-dev/controllers/http/process.php:298 Comment: We fill the process step used for Ajax queries

trans-unit.source: At least one table with same prefix was already found, please change your prefix or drop your database
trans-unit.target: 如果找到相同前缀的数据库表，请更换前缀或者删除您的数据库表。

trans-unit.source: You must enter a database name
trans-unit.target: 您必须输入一个数据库名

trans-unit.source: You must enter a database login
trans-unit.target: 您必须输入一个数据库登录名

trans-unit.source: Cannot convert database data to utf-8
trans-unit.target: 无法将数据转换成 utf-8

trans-unit.source: The values of auto_increment increment and offset must be set to 1
trans-unit.target: 自动递增增量和抵销的值必须设置为1

trans-unit.source: Database Server is not found. Please verify the login, password and server fields
trans-unit.target: 数据库服务器没有找到。请检查登录名，密码和服务器领域

trans-unit.source: Attempt to create the database automatically

trans-unit.target: -- 请选择您主要经营项目 --
未找到数据库文件结构

trans-unit.source: File "language.xml" not valid for language iso "%iso%"
trans-unit.target: 文件 "language.xml" 在语言 iso "%iso%" 里无效

trans-unit.source: An SQL error occurred for entity %entity%: %message%
trans-unit.target: 实体发生 SQL 错误 %entity%: %message%
不能为实体"%entity%" 创建图片"%identifier%"
升级过程中检测到警告。
升级过程中检测到错误。
